description.en: A story of three childhood friends - Colo, Cookie, and Naomi - who grew up in a sleepy backwater town on an uncivilized planet. They struggle to get by while holding on to their dreams of leaving town and finding a better life but can their friendship endure the tests of time? Can it withstand invading armies, broken dreams, conflicting ambitions, divided loyalties, jealousy and even betrayal?
description.pt-br: De Jiro Matsumoto (autor de Freesia) vem com uma história de três amigos de infância – Colo, Cookie, e Naomi – que cresceram em uma cidade estagnada em um planeta sem civilização. Eles lutam para sobreviver enquanto buscam seus sonhos de deixar a cidade e encontrar uma vida melhor … mas a amizade deles pode suportar as provações da vida? Pode suportar os exércitos invasores, sonhos desfeitos, as ambições conflitantes, lealdades divididas, ciúme e traição?

biography.en:
**Name** (in native language)
松本次郎
**Associated Names**
Matsumoto Jirou
Matsumoto Jirô
Дзиро Мацумото

---
He was born in Nerima but grew up in Mie Prefecture.
Musashino Art University, Department of Sculpture graduate.
His debut work, story called "Little Feat", was a quasi-winner in '92's Chiba Tetsuya Award.

Matsumoto Taro is his older sister.
**Birth Date**
August 20, 1970
